author: jm
msg: allow_user_rules fixes: block user-defined SenderBase rules; sanitise arguments to many regexp rules; run helper apps as uid=user euid=user; ensure regexps are valid before they are used in the ruleset. fix a couple of rules to work with these changes.

author: parker
msg: Bug 3334: create sed_path cache to be used by sed_path and clear the cache in compile_now after running the test msg

author: mcconnell
msg: flattern the index.xml structure and tweak standard.xml

author: mcconnell
msg: add separation of the notion of system root enabling existance of multiple index.xml defintions within a system and the importing of one or more index.xml files into other index.xml files
